thread.title: Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisville
thread.title_full: Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisville

title: Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisville
text: Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisvi - NBC29 WVIR Charlottesville, VA News, Sports and Weather Member Center: Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisville Posted: Updated: Marcus Salandy-Defour scored his first goal since 2013, after missing all of last season with a knew injury Patrick Foss scored twice for Virginia, including the game-winner with 1:34 remaining Virginia junior Patrick Foss scored on a free kick from beyond midfield in the 89th minute, and #11 UVa defeated Louisville 3-2 Friday at Klockner Stadium. Foss' goal came exactly one minute after the Cardinal's Michael DeGraffenreidt scored on a header to tie the match at 2-2. "I've scored some long goals before, but that's definitely my longest," says Foss. "It's pretty unbelievable. I didn't really know what to do. I sprinted to the bench. It was an awesome feeling." Foss also scored on a free kick in the 74th minute. The Cavaliers (6-1-2, 2-1-1 ACC) never trailed in the match, as Marcus Salandy-Defour scored in the 32nd minute to give UVa the 1-0 halftime lead. The junior tallied a goal on his first shot in his first game since 2013. Salandy-Defour missed all of last season with a knee injury, and was also sidelined for the first half of this season with injuries. The start time of the game was moved from 7:00 PM to 1:00 PM due to forecasted foul weather, and it was rainy and windy throughout the entire match. Head coach George Gelnovatch says, "Today I would hate to be a goalkeeper. Seriously. Today is a goalkeeper's nightmare, and both teams took advantage of that, just getting dangerous balls, and crosses, and shots. A lot of them went in today, and we were fortunate that our last good chance went in." Virginia returns to action Monday at home against Portland. Last-Minute Goal Gives #11 UVa Men's Soccer 3-2 Win Over Louisville More>>
